definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: Sea burials are permissible for Muslims in extraordinary circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 海葬对于穆斯林来说只会用于极端的情况下。

sentences.english: Deborah's horrific death was a rare tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 黛博拉的惨死是个极端的悲剧。

sentences.english: Confucius' thought and theory of later generations produced profound influence.
sentences.chinese: 孔子地思惟及学说对后世发生啦极端深远地影响。

sentences.english: Assassination is the extreme form of censorship.
sentences.chinese: 暗杀是审查的极端形式。

sentences.english: His extreme practices aroused the alarm and horror of European bloodletting physicians .
sentences.chinese: 他的极端行为激起了欧洲放血医师的警觉和恐慌。

sentences.english: Climate change and extreme weather events will further complicate the picture.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化和极端天气现象更使情况雪上加霜。

sentences.english: For extreme diseases, extreme methods of cure, as to restriction, are most suitable.
sentences.chinese: 对于重病，就克制治疗而言，最宜采取极端之疗法。

sentences.english: Western China is characterized by high-altitude airfields and extreme hot and cold climate conditions.
sentences.chinese: 中国西部有着典型的高海拔机场和极端温度环境。

sentences.english: The policy was followed to an absurd extreme.
sentences.chinese: 这项政策被执行到了极端荒谬的程度。

sentences.english: Extreme circumstances make very little difference to our wellbeing.
sentences.chinese: 极端情况对我们的幸福影响很小。

sentences.english: It is usually added that understanding must not go too far.
sentences.chinese: 再则，也常有人说，理智不可太趋于极端。

sentences.english: Nowadays extremophilic microbes are the hotspot in life science study.
sentences.chinese: 极端环境微生物是当今生命科学领域的研究热点。

sentences.english: In a word, the characters reflect each other's desires with an extremely introspective attitude.
sentences.chinese: 画中人以某种极端内省的姿态照映出彼此的欲望。

sentences.english: The frequency of extreme weather events increases disproportionately as global teThe frequency of extreme weather events increases disproportionately as global temperatures rise.
sentences.chinese: 全球气温上升和极端气候事件出现的频繁度不成比例。

sentences.english: Ultra-low distortion at extreme sound pressure levels.
sentences.chinese: 超低失真的极端声压级。

sentences.english: The stock markets have become extremely volatile.
sentences.chinese: 股票市场已经变得极端的涨跌无常。

definition: to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
